metadata.description: Sexy comedy and a surreal parody with a satirical taste. The setting is an imaginary Paris, in a particular neighborhood where there are five brothels. The tenants, not only sexy but very fiery temperament, take on "battle" to impose the power of their maison on the others. But when it comes to the grotesque and slimy mayor, the girls will be able to bury the hatchet and gang up on the common enemy.
metadata.name: Route des Maisons Rouges
